content:
That day,
seeing you fishing in the same pond with other visitors,
I came up with a fun new idea!
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
What if we had one team as "goalkeepers",
another team as "scorers",
and used fish as "points" for the match,
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
I was looking for clownfish,
but they all swam away when I had my fishing rod in hand.
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
As I thought, my clothes are too noisy,
they're affecting my fishing performance.
I wonder where I could find a quieter "fishing rod"?
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Gahahahaha~!
I've been trying with this fishing rod for ages,
but none of those fish are taking the bait!
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
The winner gets all the fish...
Isn't that more fun than just regular fishing?
I better get some "points" ready and give it a try, haha!
info: 闲聊-NPC自己手持钓竿-1003乐福_单一闲聊
